desc: A San Diego specialty coffee roaster and coffee shop focused on high-quality, ethically sourced coffee, and providing happiness to all we connect with! Stop by our Mira Mesa/Miramar coffee shop and try our specialty coffee drinks, empanadas, malasadas, breakfast burritos, açaí bowls, and an assortment of baked goods.

layout.text: COFFEE IS A JOURNEY. JAUNT IS YOUR GUIDE.
